desc.p: Specifies the ID of the transaction whose data is accessed in the request.
Specifies the IP address logged by the external user.
Specifies the type of the request from ARC IB. For example, Enquiry, Version, Contract.
Specifies the time on which the data is accessed by the external user
Specifies the Version name or Enquiry name that is accessed by the external user.
Specifies the mode through which the data is accessed.
Specifies the status of the record accessed by the external user.
Specifies the ID of the application that is accessed by the external user.
Specifies the channel used to communicate with T24.
Specifies the date on which the data is accessed by the external user.
Specifies the ID of the external user.
